title: Pyke can use his ult when in GA
body:
I don't think this is an healthy interaction. Since Pyke is clearly overtuned right now why not remove this unhealthy feature of him {{sticker:zombie-brand-clap}}

https://youtu.be/tvFTaUELkP0

replies.body: games just buggy, live with it **LOL**
KFCey nailed it.  I got a screen cap for folks.  Not really a bug, just how non channeled ability's function with GA.

> [{quoted}](name=Kai Guy,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=u8g3z6W6,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2019-09-03T18:08:45.922+0000)
>
> KFCey nailed it.  I got a screen cap for folks.  Not really a bug, just how non channeled ability's function with GA.

So GA allows non-channels to complete even though death would interrupt them?
So if I bought GA on Orianna she could ult while "dead"?

That or, I believe, if a Zill ultied you. Should complete the ability and damage to my knowledge.  I can try and get some folks together next day off I have and run a bug test then update the wiki if folks think this is relevant information.

But its not ulting when dead, its that GA/Zill R prevent "Death"  So casting it prior to hp hitting 0 should consistently result in non channeled ability's completing their animation and damage.

You should not be able to cast anything besides {{item:3107}}  **during ** the rez to my knowledge.

its more like the channel is unstoppable if hes in  revival.
Nah pyke had Hp. I slowed it down to check.

Ya I say that is BS.  There are a lot of abilities that you cast while alive and die during the animation and it does NOT go off.   

Ether ALL need to finish or ALL need to be stopped.

Reksai Ult is one of those.  You can die while untargetable (some burn) and so die before the leap.  Thats the SAME as here.

Riot being inconsistent?  No.... just bad.

That clip doesn't show Pyke using his ult while being revived by GA. It shows Pyke using his ult when he's alive with very little health, and then he loses all his health and is revived by GA, and then the ult's animation completes while he's still being revived by GA. This is how all of the game's non-channeled animations work.

i have never seen this happen
